attributes.action: Publish full details of all government contracts awarded
attributes.additional_details: The general public deserve to know how their money is being spent and what they can expect from an awarded contract. Full transparency is long overdue and faith needs to be restored in the current administration.  There are too many incidents of contracts being exposed as awarded to family members or friends of ministers and it has to stop.
attributes.background: All contracts that are awarded to private companies or individuals should be completely transparent, published and available to view by any member of the general public. This should include the value of the contract, the scope of works and directors/shareholders that are associated with the award.
